wip_description: This feature is currently under development. Stay tuned for updates!
wip_templateDescription: This page is a placeholder to demonstrate the routing and navigation structure. Developers using this template should replace this with their own feature implementation.
auth_register_description: Enter your details below to create your account
settings_description: Manage your application preferences and configurations.
settings_wipDescription: We are working on a comprehensive settings panel to give you full control over your experience.
settings_changePassword_description: Update your password to keep your account secure.
settings_changePassword_success: Password changed successfully. Please log in again.
profile_description: This is how others will see you on the site.
profile_personalInfo_emailDescription: Your email address cannot be changed here.
profile_personalInfo_bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
profile_avatar_dialogDescription: Enter a URL to an image to use as your avatar.
profile_avatar_urlHint: Enter a valid URL starting with https://
profile_avatar_urlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (http:// or https://)
dashboard_welcome_title: Welcome to your new SvelteKit App!
dashboard_welcome_description: This template is designed to help you build production-ready applications faster. Here is a quick overview of what's included.
dashboard_feature_auth_description: Complete auth flow with login, protected routes, and token refresh logic.
dashboard_feature_i18n_description: Type-safe translations using Paraglide JS. Try switching languages!
dashboard_feature_ui_description: Beautiful, accessible components built with Tailwind CSS and Bits UI.
dashboard_feature_api_description: OpenAPI integration with auto-generated types for your .NET backend.
dashboard_guide_step1: Features are grouped by domain in `src/lib/components/`. To remove a feature, delete its folder, route, and translation keys.
dashboard_guide_step2: Run `npm run api:generate` when the backend API changes to regenerate TypeScript types.
dashboard_guide_step3: Use `npx shadcn-svelte@next add <component>` to add new UI components from shadcn.
dashboard_guide_step4: Before committing, run `npm run format && npm run lint && npm run check && npm run build`.
dashboard_guide_step5: Check `AGENTS.md` for detailed coding conventions and patterns.
gettingStarted_removal_subtitle: Ready to build? Here's how to clean up
gettingStarted_removal_routes_desc: Delete analytics/ and reports/ folders, update SidebarNav.svelte
gettingStarted_removal_i18n_desc: Remove dashboard_* and gettingStarted_* keys from en.json & cs.json
gettingStarted_removal_nav_desc: Edit SidebarNav.svelte to remove example nav items
gettingStarted_docs_description: Check the Copilot instructions file for detailed coding conventions, patterns, and best practices.
error_403_description: You don't have permission to be here. Nice try though, we appreciate the effort.
error_404_description: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been abducted by aliens.
error_500_description: The server is having a bad day. Our code monkeys are working hard to fix it.
error_default_description: Something went wrong. We're not sure what, but it's probably not good.
settings_deleteAccount_dangerDescription: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All your data will be permanently removed.
settings_deleteAccount_description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
settings_deleteAccount_dialogDescription: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm.
meta_admin_description: Manage users, roles, and system settings.
meta_adminUserDetail_description: View and manage user account details.
admin_users_description: Manage user accounts, roles, and access.
admin_userDetail_description: View and manage user account details.
admin_userDetail_roleManagementDescripti: Assign or remove roles for this user.
admin_userDetail_accountActionsDescripti: Lock, unlock, or delete this user account.
admin_userDetail_deleteConfirmDescriptio: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this user account? This action cannot be undone.
admin_userDetail_cannotManage: You do not have sufficient privileges to manage this user.
admin_roles_description: View roles and their assigned user counts.
